movie.title: A Christmas Carol
movie.plot: Scrooge is a miserly old businessman in 1840s London. One Christmas Eve he is visited by the ghost of Marley, his dead business partner. Marley foretells that Scrooge will be visited by three spirits, each of whom will attempt to show Scrooge the error of his ways. Will Scrooge reform his ways in time to celebrate Christmas?
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 4 nominations.
